text: Eric Boehlert (December 6, 1965 â€“ April 4, 2022) was an American media critic and writer. He founded Press Run. He was a staff writer for Salon for five years. He also was a contributing editor to Rolling Stone and as a staff writer at Billboard. Boehlert was killed on April 4, 2022, after being hit by a train in Montclair, New Jersey, while cycling at aged 57. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American movie critics Category:American editors Category:Writers from New Jersey Category:People from Montclair, New Jersey Category:Railway accident deaths Category:Accidental deaths in the United States
title: Eric Boehlert
